name: Candy For Santa
description:
Candy for Santa is a game of skill.  Santa is hungry.  Use the candy cane shaped mouse  to feed Santa before he disappears deep down into the chimney.   

This windows game is complete with 78 levels of 20 points each.   Between each level,  you can read an interesting fact about Christmas traditions. 

 Feel free to leave comments.  Thank you for playing.  I hope you enjoy this joyous little Holiday game.
